import React from 'react'; // Import the Component component from React import ProjectHeader from './../projectPage/ProjectHeader.js' import SectionOne from './../projectPage/SectionOne.js' import Image from './../projectPage/Image.js' import Text from './../projectPage/Text.js' import ReactPlayer from 'react-player' import Divider from './../projectPage/Divider.js'; const data = { 'heroVideo':require('./../../content/projects/joyStory/hero.mp4'), } const a = { 'text':'Joy Story have created a collaborative workplace experience, giving companies the tools to increase employee engagement, in response to the market demand for workplace wellbeing. Currently, companies are looking to engage their office employees by purchasing joyful games that encourage competition such as table tennis, table football and other office ice-breakers. Insights from market research drove us to design experiences that encourage collaboration rather than competition with balanced foot controls that require teams to work together to complete the Tilt Maze.', 'image':require('./../../content/projects/joyStory/3.png'), 'image2':require('./../../content/projects/joyStory/1.png'), } const b = { 'title':'Gathering Insights', 'text':'As part of a comprehensive research and testing process, we visited train stations, spoke to passengers and staff and interviewed station managers and transformation teams. We assembled a focus group that assisted in creating our original designs, and presented our ideas at an Innovation Pitch in December. Our final idea was extensively tested on our user group in situ and iterated, and the feedback will inform the next iterations. Throughout, we focused on real-world feasibility.', 'image':require('./../../content/projects/joyStory/2.png'), } const c = { 'title':'Peak-End Theory', 'text':'', 'image':require('./../../content/projects/joyStory/5.png'), } const d = { 'title':'London Bridge Station', 'text':'', 'image':require('./../../content/projects/joyStory/4.jpg'), } const e = { 'title':'Brompton Bicycles', 'text':'', 'image':require('./../../content/projects/joyStory/4.jpg'), } const f = { 'title':'Brompton Bicycles', 'text':'', 'image':require('./../../content/projects/joyStory/6.png'), } function JoyStory(props) { return(
) } export default JoyStory;
